faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about the AI Noise Generator

items.title: What types of noise can I generate?
items.description: You can generate various types of noise including white noise, pink noise, and brown noise, each serving different purposes in audio production.

items.title: Is the noise generation service free?
items.description: Absolutely! Users receive daily credits to generate noise, with options to earn more through engagement. Professional plans are available for higher volume requirements.

items.title: Can I use generated noise in commercial projects?
items.description: Yes, users with a subscription plan can use the generated noise for commercial purposes, while free-tier users may use it for personal projects only.

items.title: How does privacy work when using the tool?
items.description: All audio processing takes place locally in your browser, ensuring your files are never uploaded or stored externally, maintaining your confidentiality completely.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Audio?
footer.description: Try the AI Noise Generator today and elevate your sound experience. No sign-up necessary.
